name: PART_DICT_MRG_HNO
description: This table contains a list of note information that this note has been merged into. The records included in this table are General Use Notes (HNO) records.

columns.name: NOTE_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the contact.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the note record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: DICT_MRG_HNO_ID
columns.description: Contains the IDs of the note records that this note has been merged with.

columns.name: DICT_MRG_HNO_CSN
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the note records this partial dictation note has been merged with.

columns.name: DICT_MRG_HNO_CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.  This column is the unique contact date of the merged note.
